'L☆SEVEN's new album is now available!\nIt's got some great songs we put together.'%K%P
'Be sure to check it out!'%K%P
Today, like every day, the display in Akihabara\nwas playing a commercial for L☆SEVEN on a loop.%K%P
They featured Shuri as the center-lead of the group.%K%P
She was the new ace rookie of the team,\ntaking center after beating the competition\nin the auditions last month.%K%P
'It has already been a year since she\njoined L☆SEVEN, huh...'%K%P
Time had certainly flown past.%K%P
After the legendary performance she put on that night\nshe raced straight to stardom.%K%P
Once she was part of the group she really made\nherself known and filled the hole that Sara left.%K%P
She also worked hard by her sister's side,\nwhich is exactly what she had always aimed to do.%K%P
'I think I finally get what you meant, Shuri.\nThis is what you really wanted, isn't it?'%K%P
'I'll give you my support, so make sure you're\nthere for me when I need it, too, okay?'%K%P
'I understand. We're both members of L☆SEVEN now,\nlet us help one another.'%K%P
'You really did it, though.\nLook at you now, all grown up and a real idol.'%K%P
Bishamonten joined the masses of people\nwho also saw her as an idol.%K%P
A lot of goddesses now looked up to her,\nhoping to be just like her someday.%K%P
But Shuri was still just like she had\nalways been.%K%P
'Jeez, where is she and what is she up to, anyway?'%K%P
We were supposed to meet up at the station\nbut I couldn't find her anywhere. No calls, either.%K%P
'C'mon, just because it's me who's her manager...'%K%P
After she made it big, I joined the agency\nthat manages L☆SEVEN so I could support her.%K%P
I worked my way through grunt work for a year.\nAnd then I finally was assigned as her manager.%K%P
And this is what I got for my work.%K%P
What kind of manager can't even meet up with their\nown assignment? Was I done for already?%K%P
'Alright everyone, here we go!'%K%P
It was a voice I knew.%K%P
A voice I knew better than anyone. Shuri's.%K%P
'What kind of stunt is she trying to pull?\nHERE of all places?'%K%P
'Aw yeah!'%K%P
Holding a mic in her hands\nshe greeted those passing by with her song.%K%P
It was strangely just like the day we first met.%K%P
But she was just a nobody back then.\nThis was different.%K%P
'Woah! Hey, is that really Shuri from L☆SEVEN...?'%K%P
There was no mistaking that it was Shuri.%K%P
A real-deal superstar was out here putting\non a free show on the side of the road,\nand everyone was stunned.%K%P
But now, Shuri had a power that influenced people\neven more.%K%P
'Alright! We aren't done yet!'%K%P
Her performance was reaching people's hearts.%K%P
Just like it had captivated me so long ago\nnow it was getting people to stop and listen again.%K%P
Like a dream come alive.%K%P
But considering Shuri's position now,\nthis might be a bit of a problem.%K%P
Her audience grew into a group, then a crowd.%K%P
And now the tension in the air was palpable.%K%P
'Shuri! This way!'%K%P
'What? Yamato?!'%K%P
The equipment and everything didn't matter,\nwhat I had to do was get her out of there.%K%P
'Hey! I'm in the middle of a performance!'%K%P
'Keep it up and you'll be performing for the police!'%K%P
'Oh, that definitely wouldn't be good...!'%K%P
I could see the headlines now,\n'Goddess Idol Arrested for Illegal Performance'.\nIt would be the end of L☆SEVEN.%K%P
'Okay, come on, let's get out of here!'%K%P
I took her hand and we ran off.%K%P
It was a rough situation but she didn't seem worried.%K%P
In fact, she seemed to be having a lot of fun.%K%P
'This is kind of exciting, huh?'%K%P
'Exciting?!'%K%P
I was busy fighting my way out of the mob.%K%P
'Come on, you can't hide it.'%K%P
'Look at that smile on your face!'%K%P
She might have been right.%K%P
The situation itself aside, this was still\nthe two of us together, and that was always fun.%K%P
'This really brings back memories, huh?'%K%P
'Of when, exactly?'%K%P
When we first met?%K%P
When her and Kagura worked so hard together?%K%P
Or maybe... When we first fell in love?%K%P
'All of it.'%K%P
'All that time you and I spent together.'%K%P
We had spent all of our time together.%K%P
We lost track of time, just focused on our work.%K%P
We laughed, we cried, and we got through it together.%K%P
All of that.%K%P
Our memories were full of fun.%K%P
'I'm glad we're back together!'%K%P
And even now in the present, we were still in love.%K%P
Not as a human and a goddess, but as man and woman.%K%P
She might have become a superstar,\nbut she was still a girl in love.%K%P
Just by holding hands together like this\nshe came back down from stardom to be herself.%K%P
It was the kind of time you had to cherish.%K%P
'Next time you want to pull something, ask me first.'%K%P
'Will you help me if I do?'%K%P
'Of course I will! I'm your boyfriend\nand your partner in all of this.'%K%P
I wanted to make anything possible for her.%K%P
Even something as crazy as this,\nas long as it would make her happy.%K%P
'Let's stick by each other for ever, okay?'%K%P
'I love you.'%K%P
